pages.text: $(li)The Archers are very good attacking you at long distance with their $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bows$(/l).$(br)$(li)Don't let them to be too far of you!$(br)$(li)On death they may drop $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bows$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in the $(l:patchouli:illagers/illager_archer_tower)Illager Archer Tower$(/l).
